::Grounded::
"Yes..I will explain all when i am done...thank you..."
He walked off in the direction Obfucious told him about finally
arriving at a lab..

--- In nbwrpg@y..., <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Windlord::
>
> "If you rather that Grounded" said Windlord and looking to Burning
hammer,  and Angel Prime "We can work in the shields ..."
>   ----- Original Message -----
>   From: gunthers8@n...
>   To: nbwrpg@y...

>
>
>   ::Grounded::
>   "Thank you....I am not sure i know your name...?"
>   He turns to Windlord and the others....
>   "Thank you for your kindliness...I will go to the lab now and i can
>   meet you back here in a day...I would rather do this in person..."
>

>   >

>   is."  He
>   > quickly gives directions to the lab from the med bay.  "I'll be
there
